title: GBTQ (World Flags)
summary: GBTQ Watch Face, just a Union Jack (and many more) in a Grunge Style.
description: Travel back in time with this Grunge era style watch face and relive those Grunge years.Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet. descriptionHTML:
Travel back in time with this Grunge era style watch face and relive those Grunge years.

Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet. There are no settings on the watch face directly.

Select the Union Jack or any other flag from the list available, all with a Grunge style.

The number of flags is constantly increasing, if you would like a flag added please email the developer directly using the email below.
Choose from an Analog or Digital Style watch face, whatever style you fancy.

Digital allows you to choose from three styles, Classical, Modern or Radio.

Added the ability to select which flags you would like on the random flags selector, just select the flags you want and then select random from the main flag selection pull down.

if you would like any flag added please email the developer directly via email.
You are kindly requested not to use the comments section for requests for flags, thank you.

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet. There are no settings on the watch face directly.

To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.
https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435

Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devices

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.
comments: No Complaints This is a neat app and works well with my Moto 360 Sport. I would like to have an option of changing the color of the hour and minute hands instead of only the second hand. Maybe this can be addressed in a future update.

Nice app some flags are wrong Dear developer please give me your email to send you the correct flag for Venezuela. Currently it has the Chinese flag although they own us we still have our own flag LMAO
Great little app but Wrong flag Great little watch face app. The Welsh flag is wrong. It shows the flag of the UK. Please fix before next round of Euro 2016 ðŸ˜ƒ
Wrong flags for some countries like Uzbekistan. Also Colorado is not a country, it's a state. Are there supposed to be other states on the list?

Looks and Works Great! This app does what or says and looks good doing it. Download, set it on your watch, then change the country and style in the android wear settings. Easy. One request; the flag for Scotland is weathered green in the upper left hand side. The Scottish flag has an all blue background and while I know this was done for an artistic grunge style, it doesn't really read true. Keeping it all blue (and grungy) would make this Scotsman happy! Love the app!
I don't know how to change the flag There is no app icon on my phone,there is no way to change the flag.
recentChanges: Version 18 - Updated more flags we are now at 97 flags, thanks for all the requests.
